Minister of Finance Liu Kun: 67 state-owned enterprises and financial institutions have transferred 860.1 billion yuan to enrich the social security fund.

So far, 67 central enterprises and financial institutions have transferred part of their state-owned capital to enrich the social security fund, with a total transfer of about 860.1 billion yuan, said Liu Kun, the finance minister.

Liu Kun made the statement at a meeting on the assignment of transferring part of the state-owned capital to enrich the social security fund jointly convened by the Ministry of Finance, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security and the SASAC.

"The transfer of part of the state-owned capital to enrich the social security fund is an important measure to reform and improve the basic old-age insurance system, a full reflection of the achievements of state-owned enterprises and the fairness between generations of the basic old-age insurance system, and a policy measure based on the current and long-term considerations."

In 2017, the State Council issued a plan for the transfer of part of the state-owned capital to strengthen the social security fund, which required the selection of some central enterprises and some provinces to carry out pilot projects.
According to Liu Kun, the transfer of the previous work has achieved positive results.
At the central level, a total of 67 central enterprises and financial institutions have been transferred in three batches, with a total state-owned capital of 8601 billion yuan.
The transfer of the central financial institutions, in which the Ministry of Finance performs the functions of the investors, has been basically completed.
The transfer of central enterprises has a certain scale.
At the local level, the pre-transfer work has been carried out successively.
By the end of 2018, pilot projects in Zhejiang and Yunnan provinces had been completed, with the transfer of state capital of 15.8 billion yuan and 18.5 billion yuan respectively.
In addition to the pilot provinces, other provinces have also carried out preparatory work for the transfer, laying the foundation for the implementation of the next transfer.

According to a joint circular issued by the Ministry of Finance, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security, the SASAC, the State Administration of Taxation and the CSRC, the transfer of part of the state-owned capital from the central and local governments to replenish the social security fund will be completed by the end of 2020.
The meeting held on that day made specific arrangements for the full roll-out.
It was emphasized that the transfer should be carried out in a pragmatic and efficient manner.
"According to the schedule, the transfer should be substantially completed by the end of 2020.
It's a tight schedule and a heavy task.

Liu said all regions and departments should meticulously organize and carefully arrange to ensure that the transfer work is completed as required; advance the work solidly and accurately grasp the content of the transfer policy; and strengthen communication and coordination to resolve difficult issues in a timely manner.

State capital transfers to enrich the Social Security Fund - from the beginning of the "Enrichment of the Social Security Fund Money Bag", the destination is to provide strong support for pension security.
However, I believe that this is not a simple equity "physical displacement", but the opening of "mathematical addition."

On September 20, the Ministry of Finance, the Ministry of Social Affairs, the SASAC, the State Administration of Taxation, and the CSRC jointly issued the Notice on the Full Transfer of Partial State-Owned Capital to Enrich the Work of the Social Security Fund.
After the publication of the document, the Ministry of Finance and other departments were soon implemented.

On September 25, the Ministry of Finance transferred all 10% of its holdings in ICBC and Agricultural Bank to the Social Security Fund, with the total value of the two transfers exceeding 115 billion yuan.
According to the regulations, as financial investors, the social security foundation and other undertakers enjoy the right of profit, disposal and right to know.
In the announcement, ICBC and ABC said that the change in equity will not lead to changes in the bank's controlling shareholders and actual controllers.
In this regard, the author believes that the transfer of equity in state-owned enterprises is not a simple change of ownership, but can stimulate a series of effects of the "addition operation."

The first step in the transfer of some state funds to social security, the "addition result", can naturally reflect the state-owned enterprises owned by the whole people, development results are shared by all.
After years of reform and development, the state-owned enterprises, especially the central enterprises, are mostly in important industries and fields in our economy.
Among them, the leading enterprise is the continuous realization of doing good and doing big and strong.
On July 10, the executive meeting of the State Council decided that this year the transfer of part of the state-owned capital to enrich the work of the Social Security Fund.

The Ministry of Finance immediately said that it would, together with relevant departments and in accordance with the arrangements of the executive meeting of the State Council, do a good job of pushing aside and transferring part of the state-owned capital to enrich the work of the social security fund, so as to fully reflect the basic old-age insurance system intergenerational equity and the development of state-owned enterprises for the benefit of all.
The second step is to strengthen the sustainability of China's social security fund and further strengthen the foundation of the pension social security system.

With the aging of the population, China's social security funds are under pressure, and the transfer of the majority of the national capital, most of the sustainable profitability and dividend capacity, not only can effectively replenish the social security fund, but also provide the source of social security funds.
Measurements show that for every 3.8 percentage points of state-owned capital transferred, the deposit rate of basic old-age insurance for enterprises can be lowered by 1 percentage point.
The third "addition result" of the transfer is to add stabilizers to the capital markets.
The transfer of the main body to gain the way is "dividends for the main, operation for the auxiliary."
As a financial investor of state-owned capital, the social security fund is really based on the return of equity dividends.
However, the Social Security Fund, as a value investor in the capital market, has a strong capacity for capital operation.

As for the listed assets in the state-owned capital, the participation of the social security fund will further optimize the corporate governance structure of the listed enterprises, which will contribute to the improvement of the business level of the enterprises and have a positive impact on the listed companies and the capital market.

At the same time, the Social Security Fund as an investment vane, the increase of the weight of shareholding, to further enhance its influence in the market, and serve as a "stabilizer" in the market.
In addition, it is also beneficial to give full play to the "value discovery" function of institutional investors and guide them to invest rationally and value.

After that, Hartmann was determined not to play any of his works under the Nazis.
Hartmann's Funeral Concerto was a violin and string concerto when the manuscript of the piece was stolen from Germany and premiered in Switzerland.

U.S. Senate approves Scalia as labor secretary - Xinhua
Washington, September 26 (Xinhua) -- The U.S. Senate on Tuesday voted to approve President Donald Trump's nomination of Eugene Scalia as labor secretary.
The vote was 53 for and 44 against, with no Democrats voting for Scalia.
Republicans believe Scalia's résumé makes him well suited to serve as labor secretary.
But in the eyes of Democrats, Scalia has long stood against workers and labor unions in his career as a lawyer.
Scalia will replace Alexander Acosta.
Acosta resigned in July under intense public pressure after being accused of "leniency" toward American billionaire Jeffrey Epstein for allegedly sexually assaulting and abducting young girls.
Scalia, 56, is a partner in a prominent U.S. law firm whose father is the late U.S. Supreme Court Justice Antonin Scalia.
The Department of Labor is the cabinet-level department of the United States federal government responsible for labour-related matters.
The White House also issued a statement the same day saying that Trump had nominated Federal Emergency Management Agency Acting Administrator Peter Geithner to formally lead the agency.
By procedure, Geithner's nomination must be approved by the Senate.

The Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA), which is part of the Department of Homeland Security, coordinates federal resources to deal with emergencies such as natural disasters and terrorist attacks in the United States.

Iran confirms development of advanced centrifuges further suspension of implementation of Iran nuclear deal
The United Nations' International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) said on the 26th that Iran has violated the Iran nuclear deal once again by using advanced centrifuges to enrich uranium.

According to reports, Iran is gradually violating the limits of the Iran nuclear deal in response to US President Donald Trump ’ s withdrawal from the deal in May 2018 and the reintroduction and tightening of sanctions against Iran.
In July, Iran suspended two other commitments, to keep its stock of enriched uranium below 300 kg, and to limit its enrichment to 3.67%.

Under the nuclear deal, Iran will be able to build only about 5,000 first-generation IR-1 centrifuges at Natanz to accumulate enriched uranium, and will be allowed to use only a small number of more advanced models for research, but not to produce enriched uranium.
If Iran succeeds in developing more advanced centrifuges, it will be able to produce enriched uranium several times faster, possibly for use in a nuclear bomb.
"On September 25, the Agency confirmed that Iran's advanced centrifuges for the Type 2 and Type 3... are accumulating or are ready to accumulate enriched uranium," the report said.
The U.N. 's International Atomic Energy Agency presented the report to member states, and a diplomatic official responded, "They are busy at the facility."

Italy's education minister has proposed a sugar tax to protect people's health.

Lorenzo Fioramonti, the education minister in Italy's new cabinet and a member of the Five Star Movement, has submitted a motion to parliament proposing that the Italian government introduce a new tax on sugar-sweetened drinks, snacks and airline tickets.

According to reports, under a bill proposed by Education Minister Fioramonti, the Italian government would impose a snack tax on sugary drinks, snacks, and other unhealthy dietary goods, as well as an environmental tax on airline tickets, a 1 euro tax on domestic flights and a 1.5 euro tax on international flights.
Mr Fioramonti said the government expected to receive €3bn in tax revenue from the seemingly small set of measures.
The proceeds of the tax will be available for use in the areas of education, health and environmental protection.

In response, Italian Prime Minister Antonio Conte said he thought it was a viable solution, while Italian MP, European MP and Alliance Party leader Giorgio Salvini tweeted sarcastically, asking everyone to quickly hide their desserts, biscuits, bread and sweets as the new government begins to impose a snack tax.
According to the report, the snack tax refers to a special tax on sugary drinks and high-calorie foods.
The imposition of the tax would contribute to public health benefits.
On the evening of September 25, the Chinese Embassy in Ottawa hosted a reception to celebrate the 70th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China.

Based on its own national conditions, China has blazed a path of socialism with Chinese characteristics, expanded the ways for developing countries to modernize, and contributed Chinese wisdom and Chinese plans to the solution of human problems.
The picture shows the guests standing in front of a photo exhibition on the theme of the 70th anniversary of New China.
Cong said China has created a rare miracle in the history of world human development and made important contributions to promoting world peace and development.
China adheres to an independent foreign policy of peace and has always advocated the five principles of peaceful coexistence as the core of the basic norms governing international relations.
China's development provides new opportunities for the development of countries around the world, including Canada, and benefits people of all countries.

Cong stressed that the development of China-Canada relations over the past 50 years has shown that only by adhering to the principles of equality and mutual respect can the bilateral relations move forward on the right track.
Otherwise, relations between the two countries will be frustrated and their interests will be damaged.
At present, China-Canada relations are encountering serious difficulties.

In June 2019, Apollo was awarded 45 manned test licenses by the Changsha Municipal Government.

China's development is an opportunity for the world, not a threat or a challenge.
(New China 70) White Paper: China's development is an opportunity for the world, not a threat or a challenge.
The white paper says China's development is an opportunity for the world, not a threat or a challenge.

'With China's overall national strength and international influence increasing rapidly, there is some international concern that China will follow the path of 'national strongman', 'the white paper said.
This is a combination of cognitive misreading, deep-rooted biases, psychological imbalances brought about by power shifts, and deliberate distortions to defend one ’ s vested interests.

It is not only the dream of the Chinese people but also the common dream of people of all countries to realize the prosperity of the country, the rejuvenation of the nation and the happiness of the people.
"China's development is an opportunity for the world, not a threat or a challenge.
"China is the main stabilizer and power source of world economic growth," the white paper said. "China is the largest contributor to world economic growth.
At present, the world economy is underpowered, and a sound Chinese economy is becoming increasingly important to the world.

China's economy is changing from rapid growth to high-quality development.New types of industrialization, informationization, urbanization and agricultural modernization have been accelerated, the economic structure has been further adjusted, industrial optimization has been continuously upgraded, and new economic growth points have emerged.

“The McKinsey Global Institute ’ s study argues that by 2040, China and the rest of the world ’ s economies could generate between $22 trillion and $37 trillion in economic value, equivalent to 15-26% of the global economy, and that greater cooperation between the rest of the world and China would create significant economic value. ”
The white paper stresses that China's economy and the world economy have undergone structural changes and are deeply integrated.
China, with a more stable economy, higher quality of growth and predictable growth prospects, is a long-term positive for the world economy.

Viewing China's economic development as a "threat" and a "challenge" and trying to push China out of global industrial chains, supply chains and value chains so as to "decouple" China from the world economy is neither feasible nor harmful.
The white paper says all-round opening up will create more opportunities for countries to share the "China dividend.
China will unswervingly pursue a win-win strategy of opening up to the outside world with greater efforts and a higher level of opening-up.
"Openness should be two-way, mutually beneficial, not one-way, one-sided beneficial.
Only when there is mutual benefit can we achieve long-term sustainability.
The white paper says China is committed to continuously expanding imports, easing market access, improving the business environment and strengthening intellectual property protection.

Only when all parties meet each other can we create an environment for development that is open, inclusive, inclusive, inclusive, balanced and win-win, and work together to make the "cake" of development bigger and form a community of interests that is mutually beneficial and win-win.
The white paper says China is providing more public goods to the international community.

This includes promoting high-quality joint efforts to build "one belt, one road", setting up multilateral platforms for dialogue and cooperation, actively participating in international and regional affairs, and actively engaging in foreign assistance.
"China has benefited from the development of the international community, and has always given back to the international community to provide it with more and better public goods."

Russia is ready to strengthen cooperation with China in the economic and trade fields, further optimize the export structure and promote diversification of Russian exports to China, Andrei Slipniov, general manager of the Russian Export Center, told Xinhua in a written interview.

While forestry, machinery manufacturing and chemicals account for a large proportion of Russia's exports to China, the export of agricultural products is also important, including oil and grease products, meat products and dairy products, as well as cereals, fish and seafood.
In recent years, Russia's exports of non-raw materials and non-energy products to China have also shown good and stable development.

Talking about optimizing the structure of Russia's exports to China, Stepnyov said Russia has set itself the task of expanding the export of high-tech products to meet the import demands of countries and regions including China.
Russia will next improve financial and non-financial support measures to promote further growth in the number of high-tech enterprises.
Russia is willing to export construction technology and high-tech building materials to China and develop cooperation with China in the fields of medicine and aviation manufacturing, Slipnikov said.
Russia and China also have great potential for cooperation in the field of urban environmental development.
He stressed that Russia's products in many areas were "qualitatively superior and competitively priced" compared with their Western counterparts.

Speaking about the two countries' goal of achieving a $200 billion bilateral trade volume by 2024, Stepanov said areas such as agriculture, machinery manufacturing, chemical industry and forestry will play an important role in achieving this goal.
The Russian side intends to promote the diversification of supply in these areas and the export of highly processed products.
He stressed that Russia intends to push its exporters into the global value chain, with China as one of the development directions.
Russian manufacturers in agriculture, metallurgy, oil and gas, and chemicals are well positioned to participate in this process.
At present, the two countries need to continue to deepen cooperation between enterprises and "set up more Russian-Chinese joint ventures to jointly develop exports to third countries," he said.

The Russian Export Center, through the Russian Export Credit and Investment Insurance Agency and the Russian Export-Import Bank, is taking a variety of measures and services to provide support for Russian exports to China, he said.

At the same time, the Russian Export Center will continue to deepen cooperation with relevant Chinese departments to promote easier access of Russian commodities to the Chinese market and develop new categories of export products to China.
There has been a marked increase in the use of the renminbi by financial institutions around the world.
The latest "RMB Tracking Special Issue," released by SWIFT in London on 26 July, shows a clear trend of an increase in financial institutions using RMB payments globally from July 2017 to July 2019.

At SWIFT ’ s 2019 annual meeting in London, the agency ’ s “Renminbi Tracking Special Issue, ” entitled“ London Perspectives on the renminbi, ” showed that, from July 2017, the number of financial institutions worldwide using renminbi payments increased by 11.31%, from 1,989 to 2,214.
Of these, Africa and the Middle East saw the largest increase in the number of financial institutions using renminbi payments, from 143 in July 2017 to 173 in July 2019, an increase of 20.98%.
According to the report, as of August 2019, the renminbi ’ s share of global payment currencies is 2.22%.
Meanwhile, London plays a leading role in the offshore exchange of the renminbi.
According to the report, in July 2019, London had the world ’ s largest share of offshore foreign-exchange transactions in the renminbi, at 33.79%.
London is firmly in the top spot in global foreign exchange trading, the report said.
In July 2019, London ’ s share of global foreign-exchange transactions was 40.14%, compared with 12.93% in the US and 7.67% in France.

Protests erupt as president steps down
The Twitter-themed hashtag and social media are pushing hard for Egyptians to take to the streets today to peacefully call for President el-Sissi to step down.
But the authorities have indicated an intention to use force to suppress it.
Since el-Sissi, then the military chief, seized power in a military coup in 2013, expression of dissent has virtually disappeared in Egypt, and any form of protest would be extremely dangerous.

The Guardian reports that the Egyptian Center for Economic and Social Rights, a non-governmental organization based in Cairo, says more than 1,900 people have been arrested since a rare weekend of protests calling for el-Sissi to step down.
Allegations of corruption surrounding Sessi and his family's profligate pursuit of vanity led to thousands of people taking to the streets for the 20th day.
Egypt's Interior Ministry stood firm yesterday, saying it would stand firm against any attempt to destabilize the country.
The center of Cairo is already heavily guarded, with riot police, security agency vehicles, and plainclothes police on the streets surrounding Tahrir Square, the site of Egypt ’ s 2011 revolution.
Al Jazeera reported that security forces detained a number of prominent scholars and social leaders on the 25th, including Cairo University political science professor and prominent columnist Nafar.
He tweeted on the 24th: "I have no doubt that the continuation of Selasi's absolute rule will be disastrous."
"It is in Egypt's interest that he step down immediately."
Prior to Nafa's arrest, Hosni, a former Egyptian military chief of staff, was detained.
Anand was arrested last year after trying to contest the presidency with Sisi.
Davutoglu, the chairman of the Constitutional Party, was also detained.
Analysts and politicians believe that, at a time of heightened economic hardship for the poor and the middle class, the purge of dissidents reflects the instability and fragility of government.
Ayman Nour, the opposition leader who once ran for the presidency, said: “The capture highlights the regime ’ s disregard for the Egyptian people and its own fears. ”
"Because of the economic mess he has made and the widespread political repression, Sessi is trying to send a clear message to key generals and politicians who might replace him."
Knoll said the government's heavy-handed approach would only increase anger in the face of a worsening socio-economic situation.
Now that the fear barrier has been breached, he expects more people to take to the streets.

On Twitter, hashtags such as "Stand Up You're Not Alone", "Selasi You're Dead", "Selasi Get Out", and "Next Friday" have attracted tens of thousands of tweets and retweets calling for people to peacefully take to the streets to demand Selasi's ouster.

Hong Kong Government launches free special training scheme to help employees affected by recent economic difficulties

The Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (HKSAR) announced on the 27th that it will introduce a free special training scheme for employees affected by the recent financial situation.
Many boutiques in Hong Kong's Tsim Sha Tsui Harbour have few customers.
As a result of the recent social strife in Hong Kong, the number of visitors to Hong Kong has dropped significantly.

The Secretary for Labour and Welfare of the HKSAR Government, Mr Luo Chi-kwong, and the Secretary for Commerce and Economic Development, Mr Edward Yau, met the media on the commissioning of the Employees Retraining Board (ERB) to implement special training programmes and measures to support the travel industry.
Mr Lo said the challenges facing Hong Kong's economy were imminent and should not wait for calm to set in.
Therefore, the HKSAR Government has launched a free training programme called "Special? Love Value Added".

People who have lost their jobs or been asked to take unpaid leave by their employers since June 1 will have the opportunity to join the scheme as long as they meet the relevant requirements, it said.

The most important part of the programme is "vocational skills" training, covering 19 industries, including tourism, retail and catering. There will also be some new "innovation and technology" courses, as well as cross-sector "general skills" courses.
The Chairman of the Employees Retraining Board, Mr Yu Pengchun, said that all course fees were free and the scheme was expected to support about 10,000 people in need.
A special allowance of up to HK $4,000 per student per month is payable to participants who have completed each full-time or part-time course and have an attendance rate of 80%.

The training courses are offered by about 50 training institutions over a period of two to three months. They can be read in daily newspapers from October 3 to March 31 next year, with a maximum of four courses per person.
In addition, the HKSAR Government has announced a series of measures to support the tourism industry to help it overcome the difficulties.
These include relaxing the grant to the Travel Industry Council (TIC), subsidising 6,000 tour guides to renew their licences, and waiving annual fees for travel agents.
Exercise is exhausting, too?
A study of athletes showed that after high-intensity exercise, the brain also showed signs of fatigue, the Russian satellite network reported.
The study, led by Mathias Percignon, an expert at the hospital in Pithier-Salpetrière, France, shows an indistinct link between mental and physical work: Both require cognitive control of activity.
"You need to be in control of the autonomous processes that can force you to stop when you have muscle and joint pain," Percignon explained.
The study was initiated by the French National Institute of Sport and Physical Education (INSEP).
The school's experts guide athletes in preparing for the Olympics.
Some athletes have begun to suffer from overtraining syndrome, an uncontrollable feeling of fatigue after a high-load exercise, with the body unable to recover and performance slipping.
INSEP asks the question: Could part of the reason for this condition be nerve fatigue, the kind caused by excessive brain work?
The study was published in the journal Current Biology.

Central bank to launch 30 billion yuan reverse repo operation
Beijing, September 27 (Xinhua) -- The People's Bank of China (PBOC) has launched a 30 billion yuan reverse repurchase operation by way of interest rate bidding.
As a result of the $40 billion repurchase due on the same day, the People's Bank of China achieved a net repurchase of $10 billion.
The central bank announced that it would launch a 30 billion yuan reverse repurchase operation on the same day, with a duration of 14 days and a winning interest rate of 2.7%.

Let Chinese citizens "go out" more reassuring - Visiting the Consular Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
Wherever you go, the motherland is behind you.
25, the first Ministry of Foreign Affairs consular protection video on the public service, the end of the short sentence caused the majority of netizens resonated.

In an interview with Xinhua News Agency, Cui Aimin, head of the consular department of the Foreign Ministry, said the video aims to further make people feel the emotion and temperature of "diplomacy for the people" and to make Chinese citizens feel that Chinese diplomats will lend them a helping hand, strength and hope no matter where they are in the world.
There are no trifles of peace abroad, one leaf is always of interest.

Over the past 70 years, the number of Chinese citizens "going out" has increased dramatically, from "less than one million a year" before the reform and opening to the outside world to more than one billion a year now, says Mr Cui.

According to statistics, since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China (CPC), more than 10 major operations have been organized to evacuate or transfer overseas Chinese citizens, and more than 40,000 Chinese citizens have been safely evacuated from dangerous and volatile areas.
Some 500,000 cases involving nearly 1 million Chinese citizens were handled and coordinated.
In times of danger, the motherland can take you home, and it is no longer a dream to have a "walk away".
By the end of August, China had concluded visa-free agreements with 14 countries covering ordinary passport holders, according to Cui.
In addition, an increasing number of countries are unilaterally granting Chinese citizens visa-free or visa-free access to their territories.

Forty-two countries and regions, including Thailand and Egypt, have unilaterally granted visas to Chinese citizens with ordinary passports, while 15 countries and regions, including Indonesia, have unilaterally granted visa-free entry to Chinese citizens with ordinary passports.
In addition to visa exemption and landing visa arrangements, Chinese citizens are becoming more convenient and easier to apply for visas.
By the end of August, China had concluded visa facilitation agreements or arrangements with 41 countries.

These include agreements with the United States, Canada, Israel, and Argentina to grant multiple visas valid for 10 years to tourists and business people, and with the United Kingdom to grant multiple visas for travel, business, and family visits for two years.
The UK and Belgium jointly launched a one-stop visa service, with France, Italy and Singapore reducing the processing time to 48 hours, 36 hours and 24 hours respectively.
For business people who often go abroad, the APEC Business Travel Card with multiple entries and convenient customs clearance is a good choice.

According to Mr Cui, holding the card is equivalent to getting more than five visas a year from 16 economies around the region, and is of great significance to business people, especially those in private enterprises.
At present, China ranks first among APEC economies in terms of the number of valid cards it holds.

The Ministry of Foreign Affairs will actively negotiate bilateral visa reciprocity agreements, urge more countries to adopt visa facilitation measures for Chinese citizens, turn the achievements of diplomatic work into measures for the benefit of the people, and continuously increase the 'gold content' of Chinese passports.

The reporter learned from the Jiangxi Provincial Highway Transportation Administration that so far, there are 1,334 passenger lines with "long lines" in 11 district-divided cities and six province-controlled counties.

Fujian provincial tax bank silver convenient people comprehensive tax payment platform official online - Zhongxin
Fujian provincial tax bank silver convenient people comprehensive tax payment platform is officially on line.
On September 27, the Fujian Provincial Taxpayer's Office of Silver and People's Compulsory Tax Payment Platform was launched in Fuzhou, Fujian Province.

On October 26, 2018, the Fuzhou Central Sub-branch of the People's Bank of China, together with the Fujian Provincial Taxation Bureau of the State Administration of Taxation and the China UnionPay Corporation, signed a memorandum of cooperation to create the first comprehensive tax payment platform in Fujian Province.
After nearly a year of construction, the platform has now been successfully put online.

According to Wang Dehui, Head of the Treasury Department of Fuzhou Central Sub-branch of the People's Bank of China, the platform adheres to the construction concept of safety, versatility, convenience, compliance and leadership.The front end of the platform connects tax, government, bank, non-bank payment agencies and social service providers.

It is reported that the platform brings together a number of projects for the convenience of the people, among which, the urban and rural residents medical insurance fee collection project has been officially put on line.
The project provides services to more than 30 million urban and rural residents in Fujian, covering 76% of the province ’ s resident population.
Health insurance fees can be paid online through "Fujian Tax Pass" "cloud payment", as well as banks' APP, WeChat public numbers, etc.

Shi Dong, deputy governor of Fuzhou Central Sub-branch of the People's Bank of China, said that the successful launch of the platform could provide the public with a safe, efficient, multi-channel and multi-mode tax payment service while ensuring the direct collection of government revenue and real-time interaction of data and information.

At present, more than 9,000 of the province's more than 16,000 inclusive financial service centers have opened the function of checking and paying medical insurance premiums, so that rural residents can safely check and pay their medical insurance premiums without leaving their villages.

According to statistics, in the 20 days since the trial operation of the platform, the number of users of the service has reached 840,000, of whom 750,000 are online users and nearly 20,000 are users of the inclusive financial service points.

In addition, the State Administration of Taxation Fujian provincial tax bureau deputy director Lin Guojing at the event revealed that the platform in the first nationwide application of blockchain electronic payment voucher technology.
Starting from next month, the payer can also download the stamped electronic payment voucher directly from the mobile phone after completing the payment.
Fujian tax information network based on blockchain technology is being built, and the "expressway" of private tax payment will be further widened.
U.S. to increase deployment of air defense systems and troops in Saudi

The United States will deploy an additional Patriot air defense system, four Sentinel radar systems and about 200 U.S. troops to Saudi Arabia as a result of previous attacks on Saudi oil facilities, the Defense Department announced Thursday.

The Pentagon said in a statement on the same day that the deployment would boost the air defense, anti-missile capabilities of important military targets and civilian infrastructure in Saudi Arabia, as well as boost the U.S. military presence in the region.
The statement also said U.S. Defense Secretary Ash Carter approved the deployment of two Patriot air defense systems and a THAAD anti-missile system.

Some U.S. defense media have questioned the effectiveness of the deployment, saying the Patriot and THAAD systems' primary interceptor targets are not low-altitude targets such as drones and cruise missiles that the United States claims to be attacking the Saudis.

Iranian President Hassan Rouhani, speaking in the general debate of the United Nations General Assembly, said that Iran can help maintain "security in the Persian Gulf" and ensure the smooth and safe passage of oil vessels through the Strait of Hormuz.
He also stressed that regional security would be achieved only if US troops were withdrawn from the region.
On the 14th of this month, several drones attacked two Saudi Aramco oil facilities, setting them on fire.
The US blamed Iran for the attack and imposed new sanctions.
The chairman's plan to increase his holdings completes last year's call for employees to increase their holdings by up to 43%.

On the evening of September 25, Celis (603716.SH) announced that Wen Wei, the company's de facto controller and chairman, had increased his stake in the company by a total of 1.0542 million shares, or 0.5139% of the company's total share capital, through the Shanghai Stock Exchange.
It is reported that before the implementation of the plan, Wen Wei directly owned 8.58 million shares of Celis, accounting for 4.18% of the total share capital of the company.
Notably, this is not the first time Seles has made a positive move.
Since last September, in just over a year, Celis has introduced executive accretion, chairman's bottom-up accretion, share buybacks and equity incentives.

On September 18, last year, Celis announced that Liu Wenhao and seven other senior executives had increased their holdings of 394,300 shares (0.1922% of the company's total share capital) to a total of 7,022,900 yuan.
Shortly thereafter, Mr. Wen Wei, chairman and controller of Celis, proposed a plan to increase the company's stock holdings and promised to compensate Mr. Wen for any losses.
As of October 31, 2018, the total amount of shares held in the company is not more than 150 million yuan.
Reporters combed found that during the period of the above initiative employee increase, the stock price of Celis was as low as 14.02 yuan and as high as 16.44 yuan.

On January 21 this year, Seles again adopted a plan to buy back the company's shares, announcing that the total amount of money to be used to buy back the shares would be no less than 160 million yuan and no more than 280 million yuan.
8, 2016 / PRNewswire / -- The Company issued the Announcement of Selective 2019 Restrictive Stock Incentive Plan (Draft) with high performance unlocking conditions.
According to the announcement, equity incentives are based on 2018 operating income, with growth rates of no less than 30%, 70%, 120%, and 185%, respectively, for the four fiscal years 2019-2022.
Judging by the performance of Celis in the first half of the year, the company maintained high growth and exceeded this year's 30% performance growth unlocking conditions.
In the first half, operating income was 842 million yuan, up 46.50% year on year; net profit attributable to shareholders of listed companies was 56.2324 million yuan, up 16.46% year on year.
Since mid-2018, Seles has reported year-on-year revenue growth of more than 38% in five consecutive reporting periods, peaking at 59%.

In 2018, the company established a dual core driven collaborative development strategy based on Medical Inspection Intensive Operating Services (IVD), Medical Consumption Intensive Operating Services (SPD), and Regional Testing Centers, to build on the strengths of the original IVD business and iteratively upgrade the SPD business.
Celis related people told reporters, in order to adapt to the general trend of health care, to achieve rapid expansion, Celis three businesses are steadily advancing.

In the field of SPD business, in January this year, Celis announced the signing of the Agreement on Cooperation in the Construction of Intensive Operating Platforms for Medical Supplies and Daily Operation and Management Services with Lingwu Municipal People's Hospital and Lingwu Municipal Hospital of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

"In fact, Celis is aggressively expanding its SPD business to provide medical institutions with refined operating services such as centralized purchasing, warehousing management, distribution and settlement of medical consumables for long-term revenue."
The person said.

On 17 September, according to the Zhejiang Government Procurement Service Information Platform announcement, Celis won the tender for a "medical consumables (including reagents) in-hospital logistics extension project" at Shaw Hospital, affiliated with Zhejiang University School of Medicine.
Medical industry analysts say the winning bid is very golden. Shaw Hospital is the first public hospital in mainland China to pass the International Hospital Review (JCI).
According to its analysis, through regional expansion, national strategic cooperation and channel M & A, Celis has basically completed the country's provincial business area coverage.
Now the bid Shaw Hospital in Zhejiang next city, should continue to replicate the model in different hospitals to enhance the company's competitiveness in the East China market.
In addition, this year Seles is also laying out new areas such as industrial cannabis, blockchain technology and so on.
Beijing 78,000 volunteers serve National Day traffic trips.

In order to ensure the smooth running of the activities to celebrate the 70th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China, more than 78,000 traffic civilization volunteers will take up their posts from the 28th, providing voluntary service at various points in Beijing until October 8.

Prior to this, the Beijing Municipal Leading Group for the Celebration of the 70th Anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China set up a volunteer headquarters and, in the early years, recruited and trained more than 160,000 highly qualified volunteers for universities, communities, enterprises and all sectors of society.
There are more than 78,000 volunteers.

From September 28 to October 8, 78,266 Capital Traffic Civilization Volunteers worked at 1,700 traffic intersections and 308 subway platforms in Beijing, including more than 300 major transportation hubs to guide traffic.

After being held by Iran for two months, the British tanker Steiner Imperial was finally released and set off from the Iranian port of Bandar Abbas on the morning of the 27th for international waters.
In the middle of last month, authorities in Gibraltar, a British overseas territory, released an Iranian tanker that had been held for more than a month.
According to the Islamic Republic News Agency, at 9: 00 a.m. local time on the 27th, the British oil tanker Steiner departed from Bandar Abbas for international waters in the Persian Gulf.

The Ports and Shipping Organization of the Iranian province of Hormuzgan confirmed that the ship's commander and crew had made a formal and written commitment that they had no claim despite the seizure.
Stena Bulk, the Swedish owner of the tanker Stena Empire, also said the ship was setting sail from Bandar Abbas.
In addition, Refinitiv's ship tracking data also found that the tanker began moving on the 27th and left the port of Bandar Abbas.
The British-flagged Stena Impero tanker was seized by Iran in July this year.
The tanker was preparing to leave the port of Bandar Abbas, a company spokesman said.
Two weeks after Britain seized an Iranian tanker in the waters off Gibraltar, the Iranian Revolutionary Guards detained the tanker, named Stena Impero, in the Strait of Hormuz.
The boat was released on Aug.
Earlier this week, an Iranian government spokesman said all the legal procedures needed for the release of the Stennis had been completed.
But the Iranian side said the investigation was ongoing.
Multiple Iranian media outlets have also released video of the tanker setting sail.
On 19 July, the Iranian IRGC Navy detained a British tanker, the Steiner Empire, in Iranian waters in the Strait of Hormuz and escorted it to Bandar Abbas.
The Iranian tanker Grace I left the waters off Gibraltar.

In addition, on 4 July, the authorities of Gibraltar, a British overseas territory, seized the tanker Grace I, carrying Iranian crude oil, in the Strait of Gibraltar on suspicion of transporting oil to Syria in violation of European Union sanctions.
More than a month later, on 15 August, the authorities in Gibraltar announced the release of Grace I.

Operation of two UHV projects
On the 26th, the quasi-east to southern Anhui ± 1100 kV UHV DC transmission project, Su Tong 1000 kV AC UHV GIL integrated pipeline project.
Both of these projects occupy the high points of the current world transmission technology, which will greatly enhance the optimal distribution of energy resources in China.
Guo Zhi, the chief economist of the State Energy Bureau, said the project, which extends from the east to the south of Anhui, is the world's largest transmission capacity and the furthest distance.
It is of great significance to promote the development of Xinjiang energy base and ensure the power supply in East China.
GIL, the gas-insulated metal enclosed transmission line.

The Su Tong Pipe Corridor Project has set the record for the highest voltage rating and the highest transmission capacity in the world for the GIL project, and has achieved the 'AC double loop network' operation with the highest voltage rating for the backbone network in East China.
According to the State Grid Corporation, the quasi-east to southern Anhui project transmission distance of 3,324 kilometers.

If conventional technology is used, more than 15% of the electricity will be lost in transit, and the project has been developed to significantly increase the economic transmission distance to over 3,000 km.
After the project is put into operation, 100 million degrees of electric energy can be transmitted every 8 hours and 20 minutes, which can help solve the problem of energy dissipation in Xinjiang.

According to full-load estimates, this line alone will deliver between 60 and 85 billion kilowatt-hours of electricity annually, enough to supply more than half of Shanghai's annual electricity consumption.
The Su Tong GIL Integrated Pipe Corridor Project is a control project of the ultra-high voltage AC ring network across the Yangtze River.

A conventional overhead line across the river would require the erection of two gigantic iron towers more than 450 metres across the Yangtze River and the construction of an artificial island the size of four football fields for each tower.

In response, the National Grid has made bold innovations, developing compact, ultra-high voltage AC GIL transmission technology to cross the river underwater through tunnels, avoiding the impact on the Golden Channel.
Two projects promote our country electrician equipment manufacturing capacity to achieve a new leap.
At present, the National Grid has been completed "10 intersection 11 straight" ultra-high voltage project, and "4 intersection 3 straight" under construction.
Foreign Exchange Bureau: the stability of China's foreign debt structure optimized continuously
"Overall, the structure of our foreign debt has been continuously optimized and the stability of our foreign debt has been enhanced," he said.

Wang Chunying, a spokesman for the State Administration of Foreign Exchange (SAFE) and chief economist, said on the 27th that China's main indicators of foreign debt are within the internationally recognized security line, and the risk of foreign debt can be controlled in general.
Wang Chunying in the Foreign Exchange Bureau on the day of the release of the end of June 2019 foreign debt data, in response to a reporter's question made the above statement.

According to the data, by the end of June 2019, China ’ s total external debt (including domestic and foreign currencies) stood at US $199.8 billion, up US $26.3 billion, or 1.3%, from the end of March 2019.

In the second quarter of 2019, more than 70% of the increase in China's total external debt was driven by the purchase of domestic RMB bonds by non-residents, mainly by medium- and long-term investors such as the central bank.

At the end of June 2019, the share of medium- and long-term foreign debt increased by 3 percentage points compared to the end of March 2019, and the share of domestic currency foreign debt increased by 1 percentage point compared to the end of March 2019.

According to Wang Chunying, with the inclusion of domestic RMB bonds in the Bloomberg Barclays Global Aggregate Index in April 2019, the recognition of the Chinese bond market by international investors has been further enhanced and domestic RMB bonds have been continuously increased.
"China maintains an overall balance of payments and the risk of external debt is manageable."

Reporter 27 from the Yunnan Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Yunnan grassland has been effective prevention and control of night moth, did not cause a large outbreak of disaster, prevention and control work has achieved results.
In January this year, grassland nocturnal moth was first discovered in Jiangcheng County, Pu'er City, Yunnan Province.

It is one of the most important agricultural pests in the tropical and subtropical regions of the Americas. It is one of the major migratory pests in the global warning system of the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations.
The pest harms more than 80 kinds of crops such as maize, sugar cane and sorghum.
It is difficult to prevent and control the insect, and there are no registered pesticides in China.

Since the invasion of Yunnan, the Yunnan Academy of Agricultural Sciences has selected Chen Aidong to lead the Yunnan Academy of Agricultural Sciences' innovation team for the prevention and control of transboundary agricultural pests.

Chen Aidong's team has mastered the population characteristics, natural enemy insect resources, foreign insect source characteristics, population migration trajectory, pharmaceutical virulence and field control effects.

They actively carried out research on and application of green prevention and control technologies.Through the implementation of new green prevention and control technologies such as population monitoring, adult trapping, scientific drug use and agronomic measures, the effectiveness of prevention and control in the demonstration areas has reached over 90%, while the use of chemical pesticides has been reduced, the natural enemy resources and ecological environment have been protected, and technical guarantee has been provided for the effective control of the outbreak and sustainable management of the grassland moth in Yunnan.
At present, Yunnan grassland nocturnal moth has been effective prevention and control, did not cause a large outbreak of disaster, prevention and control of the work has achieved periodic results.

In the next step, Yunnan Agricultural Academy of Sciences will focus on the ecological mechanism of the outbreak of population migration invasion, breakthrough biological control and green control technology system.

At the same time, we will actively promote cross-border international cooperation and strive to set up joint key laboratories and joint monitoring networks and demonstration areas overseas to enhance the all-round monitoring and early warning capability of the Yunnan grassland moth.

According to the People's Bank of China website, the People's Bank of China is scheduled to issue a set of gold and silver commemorative coins for the China International Import Expo on September 30, 2019.
There are two gold and silver commemorative coins, one gold and one silver, all of which are legal tender of the People's Republic of China.

According to the introduction, the set of gold and silver commemorative coin obverse design is Beijing Temple of Heaven prayer hall, and the name, year number and "China International Import Expo" Chinese characters.

The reverse of the 8-gram round gold commemorative coin features a mother and child panda drawing, and is printed with the words "8g Au.999", "China International Import Expo" in English and denomination.

The reverse of the 30-gram round silver commemorative coin features a mother and child panda drawing and is printed with the words "30g Ag.999", "China International Import Expo" in English and denomination.

According to the introduction, the 8 gram round gold commemorative coin is a universal coin, containing 8 grams of pure gold, 22 mm in diameter, 100 yuan in denomination, 99.9% in color, with a maximum circulation of 10,000.
The 30-gram round silver commemorative coin is a universal coin, containing 30 grams of pure silver, 40 mm in diameter, denominated at $10, 99.9% in colour, with a maximum circulation of 20,000.
The gold and silver commemorative coins were minted by Shenyang Mint Co., Ltd. and distributed by China Gold Coins Corporation.
White Paper: China's Development Path
Beijing, September 27 (Xinhua) -- The Information Office of the State Council of the People's Republic of China (PRC) has published a white paper entitled "China and the World in the New Era".

The white paper says that over the past 70 years, the Chinese people have made painstaking efforts to explore and forge ahead, successfully blazing the path of socialism with Chinese characteristics and achieving development that has attracted worldwide attention.
The white paper says China's development depends on self-reliance and hard work.

China's development is based on the spirit of "800 million shirts for one Boeing", in which the generations continue to struggle and toil and sweat beyond the imagination of others; on the spirit of "carrying the burden of one's own life", whether in prosperity or in adversity, not to export problems, not to pass on contradictions, not to buy, sell or plunder other countries to develop oneself; and on the spirit of "crossing the river by feeling for stones", not to follow the old road of imperialism and colonialism, not to copy the development model of the Western countries, but to integrate China's reality, summarize lessons learned, draw on human civilization, dare to try and go out of one's own way.

The white paper says that China has developed in interaction with the rest of the world, that China's development has injected positive energy into world peace and development, and that China's path is in line with China's national conditions and the requirements of the times.
China takes concrete actions to safeguard world peace.
In the past 70 years, China has not initiated any war or conflict, nor has it encroached on an inch of other countries' land.
The white paper says that the fundamental reason for the great success of China's development over the past 70 years is that China has found a correct path to development and is firmly on that path.

This is a path to be established in the light of China's national conditions, putting the interests of the people first, carrying out reform and innovation, seeking common development in opening up and ruling the country by law in an all-round way.
Without centralized, unified and strong leadership, China will move towards division and disintegration, bringing disaster to the world.
'Over the past 70 years, China has overcome all kinds of risks and challenges and created one Chinese miracle after another that has attracted worldwide attention, 'the white paper says.

Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China (CPC) in particular, China has made historic achievements in its development and undergone historic changes, and the Chinese nation has made a great leap from rising up and becoming rich to becoming stronger.
With the advance of the times, China's development path will increasingly show bright prospects for development.
Textile representatives from 45 countries and regions jointly issued the World Declaration on Textiles.

At the 2019 World Congress of Textile Manufacturers, held in Ke Qiao District, Shaoxing City, Zhejiang Province, representatives from 45 countries and regions jointly issued the World Declaration of Textile Manufacturers.

Looking to the future, the countries concerned will work together to promote the high-quality development of the world's textile industry by adhering to the principle of open coordination, driven by science and technology, and driven by fashion leaps, the declaration said.

The conference brought together about 1,200 textile industry representatives from 45 countries and regions to explore ways of sustainable development and win-win cooperation in the textile industry around the world.
Sun Ruizhe, president of the China Textile Industry Federation, said that the global industrial division of labor, trade pattern and innovation pattern are undergoing profound readjustment.

Standing at the "crossroads" of the global textile transformation and upgrading, Sun Ruizhe said, "To achieve sustainable development and common prosperity of the industry, we need the active participation of the global textile workers, their respective expertise and benefit sharing."

At the conference, representatives of the textile industry from 45 countries and regions jointly issued the "Declaration of the World Textile Trader", jointly expounding the development goals and vision of the global textile industry.

The Declaration states that, facing the future, relevant countries will adhere to the principle of openness and synergy, continuously promote interconnection between industry and market, and jointly upgrade the level of development of the industrial chain; will adhere to the principle of driving science and technology, continuously strengthen basic research, applied research and technological transformation, and jointly enhance basic industrial capabilities; and will make a leapfrog in cohesion with fashion to give full play to the role of textiles and clothing as a carrier of culture and a bridge of civilization, and jointly enhance the cultural value of industry.

Lureno Bartholomei, president of the Brazilian Association of Fashion Designers, said in an interview that the publication of the Declaration would help countries to raise the level of development of the textile industry chain and achieve sustainable development.

Loureno Bartholomei, for example, points to the Brazilian Association of Fashion Designers, which has more than 130 high-end local apparel brands dedicated to designing stylish, high-end apparel products, as well as a variety of fine fabrics.

As the host of the World Congress of cloth merchants, Ke Qiao has the largest textile market in the world. At present, it is gradually building a new pattern of upgrading and opening to the outside world, representing the Chinese textile image at the forefront of the world.

Shen Zhijiang, secretary of the Ke Qiao District Committee, said Ke Qiao would use the meeting as an opportunity to advance the textile industry towards a more open, inclusive, inclusive, balanced and win-win direction.
Reuter's estimate of the midpoint of the yuan is around 7.0883 yuan with a counter-cyclical impact of 460 points.

The currency is expected to open near 7.0883 yuan on Friday, down about 154 points from the previous day, according to Reuters estimates based on the yuan's formation mechanism published by the China Foreign Exchange Trading Center (CFETS).
The last day's close was 7.1315 yuan to the dollar, while the median price was 7.0729 yuan.

According to the pricing mechanism, the 586 point drop in today ’ s median price reflects the market ’ s supply and demand effects, the 27 point drop reflects the number of points needed for the overnight basket to remain essentially unchanged, and the 460 point rise reflects the “counter-cyclical ” effect.
Reuters put the last day's yuan at 7.0947 yuan to the dollar, a deviation of 218 points from the actual value reported by the Exchange Center.

The RMB exchange rate CFETS index, the reference SDR (Special Drawing Rights) basket index and the reference BIS (Bank for International Settlements) basket index were 91.26, 91.46 and 94.92, respectively, based on the median price published by CFETS.
The completion of Tianjin Zhou Dafu, the tallest building in northern China, created more than 100 national patent achievements

The completion ceremony of the first high-rise building in northern China, Tianjin Zhou Dafu Financial Center, was held in Tianjin Binhai New Area on the afternoon of 26th, marking the success of the collaborative management platform of the high-precision BIM model, a self-developed architectural information model that has been awarded the Global Excellence Award in the Global Engineering Construction Industry by the Tianjin Zhou Dafu Financial Center Project Department.

Located in the Tianjin Economic and Technological Development Zone, the project has a total floor area of 390,000 square meters, four floors underground, 100 floors above ground, and a height of 530 meters.

According to the head of the project department of Tianjin Zhoudaofu Finance Center, the total amount of steel used in the project is over 70,000 tons, and the height of the high-altitude group is about 376,000 meters, equivalent to 42.5 Everest peaks.
The complexity and processing difficulty of steel structure in Tianjin Zhoudaofu Project is unprecedented.

According to industry sources, the Tianjin Chow Tai Fook Financial Centre has taken the lead in implementing BIM management in all aspects of skyscraper projects already completed or under construction in China.

Creatively put forward and successfully implemented the full staff participation, full professional application, full process implementation of the "three full BIM application" model, developed the collaborative management platform based on the high-precision BIM model.

The director said that during the construction of Chow Tai Fook, the project department first carried out the BIM construction in the virtual world, and then carried out the physical construction after the scientific and accurate verification, thus eliminating the problems that may have occurred in the previous construction work.

In 2017, Chow Tai Fook Financial Center Project's BIM Innovation Achievement was awarded the first prize of the Construction Group of the Global Award of Excellence in Engineering and Construction Industry at the Global AU Master Concourse and the 2017 Global Award of Excellence in Engineering and Construction Industry.
During the construction of the project, more than 130 national patents were created.

It is worth mentioning that the BIM innovation and the scientific and technological innovation promoted by the Tianjin Zhou Dafu Project have not only made the complex and numerous construction links a success, but also reduced the construction time by more than four months, and promoted the safety management.
Recently, the Tianjin Chow Tai Fook Financial Center Project was awarded the 2019 ISA International Security Award.
The 86th joint Mekong River patrol was completed.
At 15: 30 on the same day, three Chinese law enforcement boats and two Laotian law enforcement boats participated in the 86th joint patrol of the Mekong River between China and Laos.
The operation began in Guanlei Port on the 24th, and lasted four days and three nights.
During the operation, the formation carried out joint patrols and anti-drug publicity activities in key waters such as the Golden Triangle, the Lao Pang Sang-goo and Mong Mo.

In addition, China has sent a delegation of police operational instructors to the 122nd and 133rd border guard companies of the Lao People's Army to conduct exchanges of police operational skills, effectively enhancing the emergency response capacity of law enforcement personnel of the two sides.

The four countries also held an exchange meeting on law enforcement cooperation in Qingsheng, Thailand, where they briefed each other on recent developments in border management, the fight against drug-related crimes and the security situation in the Mekong River basin, and reached consensus on strengthening information exchange, research and law enforcement cooperation.

After the operation, China and the Lao People's Democratic Republic will continue to carry out 10-day joint training and joint patrols to improve the Mekong River security and stability, said the head of the water patrol unit of the Yunnan Provincial Public Security Bureau.

The Thai commander said that since the launch of the joint Mekong River patrol law enforcement, the four countries have made close exchanges, deepened practical cooperation and achieved fruitful results in law enforcement, security cooperation and cultural exchanges.

We hope that the four-party law enforcement cooperation will continue to deepen and expand, and work hard to open up a new situation of law enforcement cooperation among the four countries, so as to make new contributions to maintaining security and stability in the Mekong River basin.

The 32nd Tokyo International Film Festival is scheduled to be held from October 28 to November 5 at the Roppongi and Hibiya venues in Tokyo.On the afternoon of September 26, the organizing committee of the festival held a press conference to officially announce the main competition unit for the Golden Unicorn Award, the "Asian Future" unit, the "Special Hospitality Works" unit, the Japanese Cinema Splash, World Focus and other units, as well as the list of films.
The competition film director introduced the Chinese entry "Under the White Cloud".
Zhang Ziyi is the chairman of the international jury of the main competition section of the film festival.
"Asia's Future" unit has three Chinese-language films

The Tokyo International Film Festival (TIFF) is the second most important film in the series after the main competition film "Asia's Future", with only eight shortlisted films, six fewer than the main competition, but three Chinese-language films from mainland China and Hong Kong.

The two Hong Kong films are "Baby Revenge", directed by Lu Yixin; "Man of the Road", directed by Huang Qingxun and starring Guo Fucheng and Miriam Yang; and "Knight of the Summer Night", directed by Yau Ying.
In addition, the Sino-Japanese cooperative action adventure film "Ice Peak Storm", directed by Yu Fei and starring Yuanshu Guangji, Zhang Jingchu and Lin Baihong, will also be shown at the festival.
The film festival spokesman, "Goddess" Alice Guangase, was absent from the press conference to make a video statement.

At the press conference, the Chairman of the Tokyo International Film Festival, Yukang Ando, the Director of the Tokyo International Film Festival, Takamatsu Takamatsu, as well as the heads of the film selection units, delivered speeches on the occasion, introducing the aims of the festival and the films to be released.

As a special guest of the press conference, the opening film — Tora-san's 50th work, Tora-san's Story: Welcome Back, director Yoji Yamada, two Japanese film directors who have been shortlisted for the main competition unit, Masaaki Baropola ("Baropola"), Masahiro Adachi ("The Story of a Comedy Wife"), as well as renowned playwright and screenwriter Kazuki Nakajima — also appeared at the press conference to share their feelings on participating in the Tokyo Film Festival.

The international jury of the main competition was composed of five judges, chaired by Zhang Ziyi of China, the other four being American producer Bill Gerber, French actor and producer Julie Gaye, Danish director Michael Knoll, and Japanese director Ryuichi Hiroki.

Chengdu "Panda Planet" and the expansion of the Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding

Chengdu, Sept. 27 (Xinhua) -- China's Xinhua News Agency (Xinhua) -- Li Qianwei, a journalist, has launched a project to expand the panda capital of Chengdu to accommodate 180 giant pandas in the future.
According to the plan, Chengdu's "Panda Capital" is composed of North Lake, Dujiangyan and Longquanshan regions, covering an area of 69 square kilometers.
The plan combines the ecological and cultural values of giant pandas with the construction of a beautiful and liveable park city in Chengdu.
"Panda Planet" belongs to the North Lake area, covering 35 square kilometers, combined with industrial planning, will form the "1 + N + X" regional space structure.

One core attraction is the project to renovate and expand the Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding; N cultural tourism consumption scene is created, namely, Panda Town, Promenade Park, Dream Garden, etc.; X regional infrastructure facilities.
With the expansion of the Chengdu Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding, the total area will be 3525 mu, which will be designated as a world-class demonstration site for panda protection.
The park is planned to accommodate 180 giant pandas and their companion animals (red panda and golden monkey).

On September 26, Baidu announced the launch of the unmanned "Level 4" fully self-driving taxi fleet Robotaxi trial operation on a specific highway in Changsha, Hunan Province.
Self-driving start-up Ma Zhixing has also launched a trial operation in Guangzhou, Guangdong Province.
The trial operation of self-driving taxis supported by the Chinese government may be expanded.
Since 26, Baidu has used 45 self-driving taxis for trial operation, and passengers in Changsha can apply for rides through a dedicated website.
There is a "safety officer" in the driver's seat to ensure the safety of the passengers.
The road offering trial operation is 50 km by the end of 2019 and is planned to be extended to 135 km by the first half of 2020.

The vehicle is the "Red Flag EV", a pure electric vehicle of China's FAW Group, equipped with the system developed by the Apollo Project, which was founded by Baidu and supported by the Chinese government.

In addition to Toyota and Honda, more than 150 companies, including Volkswagen of Germany, Daimler of Germany, Ford Motor of the United States, Intel of the United States, Microsoft of the United States and Nvidia of the United States, participated in Baidu's Apollo program.
China's largest internet taxi service has unveiled plans to launch 30 self-driving taxis on the outskirts of Shanghai this year.
China's self-driving development is likely to become more competitive.
Taiwan Scholar Suggests Taiwan Businessmen Need to Follow Mainstream Industry in China
"2019 Taiwan Business Innovation Business Mode Forum" 26, 27 consecutive days held in Taipei.
A number of Taiwanese business representatives and scholars were invited to share their experiences on enterprise transformation, innovation, succession and market development.
The forum was hosted by the Taipei Institute of Management and Management, and co-hosted by the Association of Outstanding Mainland Taiwanese Businessmen.
The two-day conference was divided into a series of seminars on transformation and upgrading, business strategy, etc.
Chen Mingzhang, president of the Taipei Institute of Management and Management, said that Sino-US trade frictions continued and Taiwan businessmen faced "uncertain times".

He said Taiwan needs to keep up with the times and keep up with the mainstream industries on the mainland, with a particular focus on innovative products related to technology, culture, tourism and health.

Chen Mingzhang believes that the above conditions are not enough.
He pointed out that Taiwanese-funded enterprises should have both speed and service, speed up the supply chain, and attach importance to extending service and living products.
In addition, "service value-added" is also a new area in which Taiwan businessmen can develop vigorously.

Speaking on behalf of the Taiwan business representatives, Xu Wentang, chairman of the Taiwan business Ai Electronics Co., Ltd. from Guangdong, said that Ai Electronics had experienced operational difficulties as a result of the sharp decline in orders, and the group had started to improve its business conditions from a number of aspects, such as restructuring, activation of assets, etc.

As long as these six points are resolved, together with the timely transformation of production lines and expansion of product categories, the enterprise will become an irreplaceable supplier to the customer.

Consultation on New Regulations: Qualification for Social Capital to Acquire Rural Land Management Rights
Social capital must be qualified to acquire rural land management rights
Measures for the Management of the Transfer of Rural Land Management Rights

Yesterday, the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs published on its website a notice for public comments on the Measures for the Administration of the Transfer of Rural Land Management Rights (Revised Draft for Exposure) (hereinafter referred to as the Opinions Draft), increasing the supervision and risk prevention of the acquisition of land management rights by industrial and commercial enterprises and other social capital transfer.
The draft Opinions are now open for public consultation.

According to the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, in order to implement the newly revised Law on Rural Land Contracting, further consolidate and improve the basic rural management system, deepen the reform of the rural land system and implement the system of "separation of powers", the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs revised the Measures for the Administration of the Transfer of Rural Land Contracting and Management Rights, resulting in the Draft Opinions.
Beijing Youth Daily reporters learned that the first published "opinion draft" has a number of important changes.

The newly revised Law on Rural Land Contracting clarifies the scope of land transfer, implements the concept of "division of three rights", and sets up separate sections on "land contract management right" and "land management right", making a clear distinction between the transfer of land contract management right, exchange right and transfer of land management right (lease, subcontract, share or other means).

In this Opinions, in order to implement the concept of "division of three rights" and effectively respond to the tenor of the Law on Rural Land Contracting, and in view of the fact that the transfer of land management rights and the exchange of land contract management rights and the transfer of land management rights are quite different in terms of parties, procedures and supervision, the revised Draft defines the scope of the transfer, focusing on the transfer of land management rights, including the transfer of leasing and equity, and changes the name of the regulation from "Measures for the Management of the Transfer of Rural Land Contracting Rights" to "Measures for the Management of the Transfer of Rural Land Management Rights".
The transfer and exchange of land contract management rights will be regulated by separate administrative measures.
According to the draft, in the context of the "division of three rights", farmers only have a limited period of land management rights.
Theoretically, even in the event of bankruptcy and liquidation, farmers only risk losing their right to operate for a certain period of time.
In order to prevent the risk of farmers losing their land, the practice has produced preferred shares, first lease shares, repurchase and other methods.
Considering that the preferred stock has been discussed in the theory of company law, it is suggested that it be used as an advocacy provision to prevent the risk of losing land.
